name: Gate VII — Dim-Kur-Ká Tug-Du
description: The final threshold of Inanna’s descent. The Gate of the Garment, where all remaining adornment dissolves and the Goddess enters the Great Below in absolute vulnerability. Here, hierarchy collapses, identity falls away, and sacred nakedness becomes sovereign truth. This plate completes the Measures of Inanna — Obsidian Gates Series, marking the moment of total surrender and luminous stillness.
